org.apache.flink.runtime.blob

Interface BlobService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlobCache, BlobServer

    public interface BlobService

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(BlobKey blobKey)
      This method deletes the file associated with the provided blob key.
      int getPort()
      Returns the port of the blob service
      URL getURL(BlobKey requiredBlob)
      This method returns the URL of the file associated with the provided blob key.
      void shutdown()
      Shutdown method which is called to terminate the blob service.

    • Method Detail

      • getURL

        URL getURL(BlobKey requiredBlob)
           throws IOException
        This method returns the URL of the file associated with the provided blob key.
        Parameters:
        requiredBlob - blob key associated with the requested file
        Returns:
        URL of the file
        Throws:
        IOException

      • delete

        void delete(BlobKey blobKey)
            throws IOException
        This method deletes the file associated with the provided blob key.
        Parameters:
        blobKey - associated with the file to be deleted
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getPort

        Returns the port of the blob service

              throws IOException
